Budget Graphics Cards


Ever wanted to buy a reliable graphics card at an affordable price, Welcome to Budget Graphics Cards, where we source out the best deals for you when buying a component that can give your computer some extra juice, whether it's gaming, video & photo editing and streaming!

Subscribe to our email listing so that you can get up to date feedback on when we will be re-stocking and getting new graphics cards that you can afford!

Features

Quality Assurance

We ensure to our customers that they will get the best-quality second-hand graphics cards that have been refurbished to the 't' so that they don't have to worry about thinking twice before buying something second-hand directly from us and the source that we have chosen to buy from!

Best and Reliable Sources

We will make sure that we source out the best second-hand graphics cards so that you don't have to. We will also make sure that the people we buy these second-hand graphics cards from are reliable enough to purchase their second-hand goods so that we both can benefit from it both financially and stress-free.

Best Bang for your Buck

Our company will provide our customers with the best value for their money depending on the graphics card that they are purchasing, we will do our utmost best to do price-checking against other companies so that we can best them at prices while we still provide quality reassurance.

Unsatisfied/faulty product.

Don't worry if you are not satisfied on our product/s or if it gets damaged on the way to you, we will allow you to return the product/s and if we cannot get it fixed and personally delivered to you within a work week, we will ensure that you will get your money back guaranteed!

Pricing

Here are some of the refurbished Graphics Cards that we will be selling

ASUS ROG Strix GTX 1060 6GB

$215

  1. Base & Boost Frequency -> 1506MHz & 1873MHz
  2. Power Supply Recommended -> 500W
  3. Memory Size and Type -> 6GB GDDR5/X
  4. Memory Interface -> 192-bit
  5. Connectivity -> Displayport 1.4, HDMI 2.0b, USB Type-C & DVI-DL (MAX 8K Resolution @ 60fps)
Gigabyte GeForce RTX 2060

$350

  1. Base & Boost Frequency -> 1365MHz & 1830MHz
  2. Power Supply Recommended -> 500W
  3. Memory Size and Type -> 6GB GDDR6
  4. Memory Interface -> 192-bit
  5. Connectivity -> Displayport 1.4 HDR, HDMI, USB Type-C & DVI-DL (MAX 8K Resolution)
MSI AMD Radeon™ RX 580

$160

  1. Base & Boost Frequency -> 1257MHz & 1393MHz
  2. Power Supply Recommended -> 500W
  3. Memory Size and Type -> 8GB GDDR5
  4. Memory Interface -> 256-bit
  5. Connectivity -> Displayport 1.4 HDR & HDMI (4K60 Supported)
XFX AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT

$320

  1. Base & Boost Frequency -> 1375MHz & 1560MHz
  2. Power Supply Recommended -> 550W
  3. Memory Size and Type -> 6GB GDDR6
  4. Memory Interface -> 192-bit
  5. Connectivity -> Displayport 1.4 & HDMI (4K60 Supported)
